channel.title: CVE Feed for videousermanuals -- White Label CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for videousermanuals -- White Label CMS

item.title: CVE-2024-4280|2024-08-01T20:33:53.282Z -- videousermanuals -- white%20label%20cms
item.description: The White Label CMS plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the reset_plugin function in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-4280|2024-06-04T17:53:43.312Z -- videousermanuals -- white%20label%20cms
item.description: The White Label CMS plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the reset_plugin function in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset plugin settings.
